setup.title: Werewolf Game Setup
setup.systemDescription: The system will randomly assign roles to each player. Each player can view their role privately.
setup.cardsDescription: The system will only show which roles are in play. Players use physical cards to determine roles.
setup.needMorePlayers: You need at least 5 players to start the game
setup.rolesMismatch: You need exactly {{count}} roles selected to match the player count. Currently selected: {{selected}}
setup.customizeRolesDescription: Click on roles to add or remove them. The total number of roles must match the number of players ({{playerCount}}).

werewolf.name: Werewolf
werewolf.description: Each night, werewolves vote to kill one villager. Werewolves win when they equal or outnumber the villagers.

villager.name: Villager
villager.description: Has no special abilities, but votes during the day to eliminate suspected werewolves.

seer.name: Seer
seer.description: Each night, can check one player to learn if they are a werewolf or not.

doctor.name: Doctor
doctor.description: Each night, can protect one player from being killed by werewolves.

bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
bodyguard.description: Each night, can protect one player from being killed by werewolves.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Has one healing potion and one poison potion to use during the game.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: If eliminated, the Hunter can immediately eliminate another player.

wolfCub.name: Wolf Cub
wolfCub.description: A young werewolf. If eliminated, the werewolves get an extra kill the next night.

spellcaster.name: Spellcaster
spellcaster.description: Each night, can silence one player who will not be able to vote the next day.

roleReveal.title: Role Reveal Phase
roleReveal.instruction: Each player should click the 'Reveal' button below their name to see their role privately.
roleReveal.allRevealed: All players have seen their roles!
roleReveal.secretlyViewRole: Each player should secretly view their assigned role.
roleReveal.selectRoleFromCard: Each player should select the role from their physical card.

night.title: Night Phase
night.noRolesWithNightActions: No roles have night actions. Proceeding to day phase...
night.allActionsCompleted: All night actions have been completed. Dawn approaches...
night.noNightAction: This role has no night action.
night.alreadyUsedAbility: You have already used your ability this night.

day.title: Day Phase
day.playersEliminated: The following players were eliminated during the night: {{players}}
day.witchPoison: The Witch used a poison potion on {{player}}
day.spellcasterSilence: The Spellcaster has silenced {{player}}. They cannot vote or participate in discussions today.
day.discussionDescription: The village must decide who to eliminate. Discuss and then vote.

result.title: Game Over
result.werewolvesWinDescription: The werewolves have outnumbered the villagers and taken over the village.
result.villagersWinDescription: The villagers have eliminated all the werewolves and saved their village!
result.thanksMessage: Thank you for playing! Hope you enjoyed the game.
